member.name: P:DealerSocket.AspNetHosting.Mvc.Configuration.CorsSettings.AllowedOriginsString
member.summary: Gets or sets the AllowedOriginsString value. ATTN: This value is not used directly. If it is set via Environment variable, you must split the string and set the AllowedOrigins property.

member.name: M:DealerSocket.AspNetHosting.Mvc.Controllers.BaseController`1.InternalErrorObjectResult(System.Exception)
member.summary: Internal error response that toggles based on environment.

member.name: T:DealerSocket.AspNetHosting.Mvc.Filters.DisableValidateModelStateFilterAttribute
member.summary: An attribute for disabling the Global ModelState Validation filter.

member.name: T:DealerSocket.AspNetHosting.Mvc.Filters.GlobalValidateModelStateFilter
member.summary: A Global ModelState Validation filter which should be added in the services section of Startup.cs.
